Articles.Content:
hello guys, since 1.0.5 update i expect a lot of crashes. The game crashes often after I revert a flight or when I launch a vessel/plane. Also it happens that the game crashes inside VAB or hangar.

I can't figure out what's the problem, so I'm asking some help to you. Thanks in advance.

output log


error log after crash

Specifically, to reply the crash of error.log, I just try to launch a vessel that i've created and that makes the game crash.
